import sys

t = int(raw_input())
for i in range(t):
    s = int(raw_input())
    pie = map(int, raw_input().split())
    rack = map(int,raw_input().split())
    pie.sort()
    rack.sort()
    t = 0
    for p in range(len(pie)):
        for r in range(len(rack)):
            if pie[p] <= rack[r]:
                t += 1
                rack[r] = 0
                break
    print t
